title: is this program bannable?

embed.description: LoLBuilder.net is an exciting new tool that brings you the best builds from the worlds best League of Legends players in both the diamond and challenger leagues.

body: so a friend of mine has been telling me to download this app that apprently comes with a handfull of builds per champion to help him.....since it dosent effect his ingame mechanics or anything like that i was wondering can he get banned for using this?

replies.body: It basically sounds like LolSumo, which isn't bannable.
i highly doubt it, in my eyes its no different then looking up a build on Probuilds, or Mobafire or something

similar....but this is ingame under recommended tab.....i dont think it is banable and it a huge help for new players and ppl not knowing what to build unless they have decent experince on there champion
Report report much cheat (its a joke if you dont get it, its perfectly fine)

If it's the same as championify, then it should be fine. I remember reading that in one of Riot's post regarding the removal of item sets is that they support Championify which is just about champ builds.
